alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest; Langlade; Lincoln; Oneida; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 6:25PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lincoln, northwestern Forest, southeastern Vilas, northwestern Florence, Oneida and northwestern Langlade Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 624 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles west of Iron River to near Eagle River to 8 miles northwest of Tomahawk to 11 miles east of Jump River. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Eagle River around 630 PM CDT. Tomahawk around 640 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Gilbert, Wisconsin Slough Natural Area, Headwaters Wilderness, Harrison, Tipler, Parrish, Whisker Lake Wilderness, Crandon and Fern. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Florence; Forest; Langlade; Lincoln; Oneida; Vilas
